name: DEATH IS ONLY THE BEGINNING! (Sandeep Kumar Pilakhnawal, Apoorv Verma, Sarthak07)
name_original: DEATH IS ONLY THE BEGINNING! (Sandeep Kumar Pilakhnawal, Apoorv Verma, Sarthak07)
description:
This is a horror action-adventure game, heavily inspired by the likes of souls-like games. 

This project was made as a Game-Jam entry held by GameDev.tv in 2022.

Controls:

>> Use WASD to Move.

>> Left Mouse Button for Attack.

>> Right Mouse Button for Dodge.

>> Headphones recommended. ☺️

Platform: PC

Team Members : 

  1. Sandeep Kumar Pilakhnawal (Developer) [LinkedIn]
  2. Apoorv Verma. (Developer) [LinkedIn] 
  3. Sarthak Verma (Game Designer) [LinkedIn]
